Class BaseListDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list.decorators.BaseListDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListDecorator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddToSsmDecorator, ElaborationDecorator, ExpansionDecorator, ExtraButtonDecorator, PageSizeDecorator, SelectableDecorator, SystemCurrencyIconDecorator, SystemIconDecorator

    public abstract class BaseListDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListDecorator
    General-use base class for writing decorators
